item.title: 06 Remake - [ RuneScape We loved Is Back ]
item.dc:creator: @Server_Sniffer Server Sniffer
item.description:
@Server_Sniffer wrote:

[quote=“zeropointx, post:33, topic:477630”]This is overall 2006 coversation but whatever.

2006 remake servers are all BUGGY, if you want to make yourself step out of every other server try doing some of these to your server:

  • clipped walking and following AND ESPECIALLY npc walking
  • obfuscate your client
  • protect packets (modifying packets won’t work)
  • try to fix some memory leaks and
    optimize your server
  • Fix all errors/fails that there already exists
  • Fix dupes

After that you can start adding your own stuff for example:

  • All skills trainable
  • minigames (that are not leeched off)
  • adding npcs
  • adding quests

When you do all of these I can GUARANTEE your server will become famous and well known.[/quote]

Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: 06 Remake - [ RuneScape We loved Is Back ]
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

This is overall 2006 coversation but whatever.

2006 remake servers are all BUGGY, if you want to make yourself step out of every other server try doing some of these to your server:

  • clipped walking and following AND ESPECIALLY npc walking
  • obfuscate your client
  • protect packets (modifying packets won’t work)
  • try to fix some memory leaks and
    optimize your server
  • Fix all errors/fails that there already exists
  • Fix dupes

After that you can start adding your own stuff for example:

  • All skills trainable
  • minigames (that are not leeched off)
  • adding npcs
  • adding quests

When you do all of these I can GUARANTEE your server will become famous and well known.

Read full topic
